data.actual_result: Discord stays where it is, but will rotate if you rotate to portrait then landscape again
data.expected_result: Since it’d be technically a video call, Discord should automatically rotate to the landscape mode.
data.short_description: Discord Doesn’t Rotates to Landscape after turning on Camera and rotating phone
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you do not have portrait lock on - Make a VOICE call - Rotate your phone to landscape - Click the camera icon to turn on the camera. - Observe
